articles.content: JAKARTA, Indonesia In October, Indonesian diplomats and Muslim clerics stepped off a plane in China. While the diplomats were there to finalize deals to ensure millions of doses reached Indonesian ci… [+7528 chars]

articles.author: Aric Chokey, David Fleshler
articles.title: COVID-19 in Florida: 11384 new cases, 120 more deaths - South Florida Sun Sentinel
articles.description: Florida reported 13,147 new cases of COVID-19 Thursday and 121 more deaths, topping 13,000 for the second time in a week. A total of 20,995 Floridians and 300 non-state residents have died from the disease.
articles.content:
